titles.title: Hymn 126 - Abide With Us Oh In Thy Grace

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Abide with us oh in Thy grace
Lord Jesus my Saviour
That never trickish creature
Militate against us

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Abide with us just in Thy word
The only precious Lordhav
We may have life in salvation
Yonder and here beneath

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Abide with us in Thy blessing
The most glorious Saviour
Give Thy good heavenly blessing
To us in abundance

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Protect us always oh our Lord
Thou powerful Saviour
That we may sidetrack enemies
To go out of bondage

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Abide with us in Thy truth Lord
Oh our merciful God
In afflictions abide with us
Let us surely endure

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Abide with us in Thy peace, Lord
When death thus close our eyes
At that crucial moment O Lord
Speak salvation to us
